decks.notes: This deck focuses on controlling the opponent's plays and generating value. It includes cards like Crop Rotation and Natural Order to manipulate the board state. Grist, the Hunger Tide, Orcish Bowmasters, and Fiend Artisan provide creature removal options. Green Sun's Zenith and Elvish Reclaimer allow for creature tutoring. The deck also includes powerful finishers like Craterhoof Behemoth and Atraxa, Grand Unifier. Additionally, it utilizes mana acceleration through Gaea's Cradle and land tutors like Verdant Catacombs and Misty Rainforest. The key concept of this deck is to control the game and secure victory through incremental advantages and powerful threats.

The key concept of this Grixis Aggro deck is to maintain control of the board while applying aggressive pressure to the opponent. It achieves this through a combination of efficient creatures like Orcish Bowmasters and Dragon's Rage Channeler, disruption spells like Lightning Bolt and Daze, and card manipulation tools like Ponder and Brainstorm. The deck also utilizes powerful threats like Murktide Regent to quickly close out games. It leverages its mana base, including Wasteland and dual lands, to ensure it can consistently cast its spells and disrupt the opponent's game plan.

The key concept of this control-lands deck is to establish a strong control over the game by utilizing the synergy between lands and controlling the opponent's resources. The deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's plans by using cards like Wasteland, Thespian's Stage, and Rishadan Port to deny their resources. It also aims to slow down the opponent's plays with Sphere of Resistance and Maze of Ith. Additionally, the deck utilizes the powerful combo of Dark Depths and Thespian's Stage to create a highly threatening creature. Finally, it uses cards like Life from the Loam and Exploration to generate value and card advantage while maintaining a strong mana base.

The main concept of this Legacy Death & Taxes Aggro deck is to disrupt the opponent's game plan while steadily applying pressure. This is achieved through a combination of disruptive creatures such as Spirit of the Labyrinth, Thalia, Guardian of Thraben, and Skyclave Apparition, as well as powerful equipment like Umezawa's Jitte, Batterskull, and Kaldra Compleat. The deck also utilizes cards like Aether Vial and Flickerwisp to allow for flexibility and instant-speed shenanigans. The mana base consists of various utility lands like Karakas and Field of Ruin to provide additional disruption.

This Grixis Control deck focuses on disruption and resource management to outlast the opponent. It utilizes cards like Thoughtseize and Hymn to Tourach to strip the opponent's hand, while also using Force of Will to counter key spells. The deck also includes a selection of removal spells like Lightning Bolt to deal with threats. The main win condition of the deck is through card advantage and incremental advantage gained through cards like Baleful Strix and Snapcaster Mage. The deck also includes powerful spells like Jace, the Mind Sculptor as a way to gain long-term advantage.

The key concept of the deck is to create a powerful combo using [[Dark Depths]] and [[Thespian's Stage]] to generate a 20/20 flying indestructible creature token with no ice counters on it. The deck includes cards like [[Crop Rotation]] and [[Elvish Reclaimer]] to tutor for or fetch these combo pieces. It also includes disruption cards like [[Thoughtseize]] and [[Hymn to Tourach]] to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck utilizes the graveyard with cards like [[Life from the Loam]] to fuel its engine and protect its combo with cards like [[Sylvan Safekeeper]].

The key concept of this deck is to quickly and efficiently combo off and win the game using a combination of spells, creatures, and graveyard recursion. The deck focuses on using spells like Thoughtseize, Summoner's Pact, and Pact of Negation to disrupt the opponent's game plan while also utilizing Lotus Petal, Chrome Mox, and Dark Ritual to generate mana and accelerate the combo. The deck also incorporates cards like Narcomoeba, Thassa's Oracle, and Undercity Informer to manipulate the graveyard and win the game through a combination of milling and self-mill strategies.

The primary focus of this deck is to establish early board presence and disrupt the opponent's game plan with aggressive creatures and disruptive spells. The deck utilizes a mix of removal spells like Dismember, Snuff Out, and Fatal Push to deal with threats, while also utilizing counter spells like Daze and Force of Will to protect its creatures and disrupt the opponent's plays. The deck also includes card selection and filtering with spells like Brainstorm and Ponder to ensure a smooth draw. The key creatures in this deck are the Orcish Bowmasters and Troll of Khazad-dûm, which provide additional disruption and threats on the board. Overall, the deck aims to apply early pressure while keeping the opponent off balance.

The key concept of this deck is to utilize artifacts and card advantage to create an aggressive strategy. By having cards like Chalice of the Void and force of will as disruption, it aims to disrupt opponent's game plan. It also uses various artifacts like Mishra's Bauble, Mox Opal, and Urza's Saga to generate card advantage and mana acceleration. The inclusion of cards like Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Sai, Master Thopterist is to further enhance the artifact theme and generate additional value. Overall, the deck focuses on quickly developing a board presence while disrupting the opponent's plays.

The main concept of this Legacy 1 vs 1 deck is to use the interaction between Nomads en-Kor and Cephalid Illusionist to mill cards from the deck, ultimately putting Thassa's Oracle into the graveyard. By using Dread Return, the deck can bring Thassa's Oracle back onto the battlefield and win the game. The deck also includes other combo pieces like Narcomoeba and Step Through to further enable the combo. The deck also includes disruption elements like Daze, Orim's Chant, and Force of Will to protect the combo and prevent the opponent from interfering.
